acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused person Raju Boro is sentenced to under go rigorous imprisonment for 3 (three) years and to pay a fine of Rs. 5,000/- (Five thousand) only i/d to under go R/I for 6 (Six) months for the offence  U/s 8 of POCSO Act. 2012.
